name: геном стрелка
description:
APOCALYPSE CAME

IT PASSED ON A CONCRETE HORSE

EVOLVE, TRUMPETER

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Genom Strelka was created for the Summer 2020 GAMED Jam. The theme was "Evolve". Take down enemies to earn credits, and use those credits to evolve your gun. When your gun has a certain genome sequence, it will evolve into a new kind of weapon. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

EVOLUTION GUIDE

Handgun: -1, 2, -1, 1

Sub-Machine Gun: -2, -1, 3, 0

Assault Rifle: 1, 1, 2, 2

Shotgun: 2, -2, -1, -1

Marksman Rifle: 3, 2, -2, 2

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tips:

- Ammo is infinite, but you must use the Right Mouse Button to reload.

- Keep moving. Enemies are far less likely to hit you if you stay moving.

- Your health will regenerate upon completing a room.

- Use jump pads to gain height and slow down time. Your accuracy is increased when time is slowed.

- You can continue to evolve your weapon and create hybrids even after reaching Mark II.
